laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated LFTs with a total bilirubin (tbili) of 4.9 (elevated)

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile toxin A & B EIA
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B (Reference Range-Negative)

Bibasilar atelectasis, trace bilateral pleural effusions, tiny pericardial effusion, relative hypoattenuation of blood pool consistent with anemia, gallbladder with no evidence of perforation and a small amount of pneumobilia.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: There has been interval placement of a percutaneous biliary drain.
